com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.analysis.sentiment

Interface SentimentAnalysisService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SentimentAnalysisServiceImpl

    public interface SentimentAnalysisService
    Interface representing the SentimentAnalysis API

    • Method Detail

      • analyzeSentimentForText

        SentimentAnalysisResponse analyzeSentimentForText(String text,
                                                SentimentAnalysisLanguage language)
                                                  throws HodErrorException
        Analyze the sentiment of the given text using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        text - The text to analyze
        language - The language of the text
        Returns:
        The sentiment of the response
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired

      • analyzeSentimentForText

        SentimentAnalysisResponse analyzeSentimentForText(TokenProxy tokenProxy,
                                                String text,
                                                SentimentAnalysisLanguage language)
                                                  throws HodErrorException
        Analyze the sentiment of the given text using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use to authenticate the request
        text - The text to analyze
        language - The language of the text
        Returns:
        The sentiment of the response
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

        SentimentAnalysisResponse analyzeSentimentForFile(File file,
                                                SentimentAnalysisLanguage language)
                                                  throws HodErrorException
        Analyze the sentiment of the given file using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        file - The file containing the text to analyze
        language - The language of the text
        Returns:
        The sentiment of the response
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
